Item.Description:
COURSE OF ILLNESS

Did your fatigue/energy-related illness start after any of the experiences listed below? Please select all that apply.

item.label: Meningitis or symptoms suggestive of a neurological infection or other neurological event or condition that prompted a visit to a physician’s office or emergency room (headache, fever, sensitivity to light, nausea, vomiting)
Myocarditis or symptoms suggestive of heart problems that prompted a visit to a physician’s office or emergency room (chest pain, palpitations, lightheadedness, loss of consciousness)
A trip or vacation within the United States
A trip or vacation outside the United States
An injection at a doctor’s office
Stress or a major life event
Eating dairy, eggs, or meat that had not been pasteurized or thoroughly cooked
Drinking water from a well, river, lake, or stream
